attributes.action: Bring Back Police Domestic Violence unit
attributes.additional_details: Make it police policy for all High/Medium Domestic Violence cases to be dealt with by specalist DV/Stalking officers, who are trained in DV/Stalkers and have experience with working with DV/Stalkers and know what they are dealing with when it comes to DV/Stalking, instead of giving these High/Medium Domestic Voilence case to Police officers who are not trained, do not know what they are looking for, who are in-experienced and under skilled to carried out this type of work effectively, which results in putting the Victims to further risk of DV by their perpetrator.  Domestic Voilence Kills - so why give officers such complex cases when it not of their specialist field of work. and lifes are at risk?
